meanings.definition: People who have a strong dislike or prejudice against homosexual people.
meanings.sent1: Some homophobes refuse to accept love in all its forms.
meanings.sent2: Homophobes often discriminate against LGBTQ+ individuals.
meanings.sent3: The homophobes at the party whispered disapprovingly when two men danced together.
meanings.sent4: The shadow of homophobes loomed over the peaceful pride parade.
meanings.sent5: The media highlighted the harmful actions of homophobes, spreading awareness.

meanings.definition: Those who exhibit fear or hatred towards individuals who are attracted to the same sex.
meanings.sent1: Homophobes may feel threatened by love that differs from their own.
meanings.sent2: The homophobes in the community spread negativity and intolerance.
meanings.sent3: During the play, the homophobes in the audience booed at the romantic scene.
meanings.sent4: The dark cloud of homophobes' opinions cast a shadow over the celebration.
meanings.sent5: The school counselor addressed the issue of homophobes bullying LGBTQ+ students.
